content.query:
-- Creating Master key
-- create MASTER key ENCRYPTION by PASSWORD = ''

-- Database Scoped Creds

create DATABASE scoped CREDENTIAL faraz_creds
with IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

-- External Data source silver

create external data source silver_source 
with
(
     LOCATION = 'https://farazdatalakeforsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/',
     CREDENTIAL = faraz_creds
)


-- External Data source gold

create external data source gold_source 
with
(
     LOCATION = 'https://farazdatalakeforsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/',
     CREDENTIAL = faraz_creds
)


-- Creating External file format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = Parquet,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'

)


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA

)
